    • About me

    I have been teaching Turkish for Foreigners and English as a Second Language for over 4 years. My goal is to inspire a lifelong love of Turkish language in my students.

    I was born in Istanbul, but lived in different parts of Turkey and the world. After graduating from Girne American University in Cyprus, I moved to Vietnam and lived there for about 4 years. For the moment I live in Spain and I love living here, but I miss all my students in Vietnam.

    I started teaching online on iTalki in 2017, but due to work load I had to stop teaching on that platform for a couple of years. In 2020, I decided to be back to iTalki and spare more time for teaching online.

    With the materials I design for each topic, I make learning process easier for the students. Currently I am working on a podcast project as you can see on my website: TurkishPodcast.com

    My favorites:

  • Food: Indian, Mexican, Turkish
  • Color/s: Red & Black
  • Movie: Horror, thriller, comedy
  • Hobby: Web Design
  • Animal: All

    • Free time activities:

    Watching movies, Netflix, Amazon Prime, driving, listening to music, creating websites, reading, traveling, hanging out with friends.

    Turkish for Kids

    This lesson is designed for younger learners (6-14 years old). The materials used in the lessons are designed for the kids to understand (mostly visual).

    Turkish for Beginners

    A1 level course for Beginner students. The coursebook will be sent to the learners.
    The package covers 6 units:
    1. Merhaba! (First lesson)
    2. Nerede? (Places...etc)
    3. Ne yapıyorsun? (Daily routine and free time activities)
    4. Benim Dünyam (Family & friends)
    5. Zaman Zaman (Holidays & Special days)
    6. Çevremiz ve Biz (Our surroundings)

    After completion of this level, the learner will be able to have simple conversations and talk about his life

    Speaking Practice

    This lesson is designed for learners who would like to practice their Turkish and also learn Daily Life Turkish. During the lessons we will cover some topics to learn new vocabulary, phrases and also idioms.

    The materials that are used in the lessons will be sent to the learners. The learners will be required to inform the tutor about their level and expectations before the lessons.
